services.name: General Consultation
services.description: Comprehensive health consultation with a licensed physician, covering general health check-ups and medical advice.

services.name: Dental Cleaning
services.description: Professional teeth cleaning by a licensed dentist to remove plaque and prevent gum disease.

services.name: Physical Therapy
services.description: Rehabilitation sessions with a certified physical therapist to address musculoskeletal issues and improve mobility.

services.name: Blood Test Panel
services.description: Complete blood work to assess overall health, including cholesterol levels, blood sugar, and other vital indicators.

services.name: Vaccination
services.description: Administration of vaccines to prevent infectious diseases, including flu, hepatitis, and more.

services.name: X-Ray Imaging
services.description: Diagnostic X-ray imaging for bone fractures, dental issues, or internal organ health assessment.

services.name: MRI Scan
services.description: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) scan for detailed internal body structure analysis, used to diagnose various conditions.

services.name: Cardiology Consultation
services.description: Specialized heart health consultation with a cardiologist, including ECG and echocardiography.

services.name: Eye Exam
services.description: Comprehensive eye examination to assess vision health and identify conditions like glaucoma or cataracts.

services.name: Prenatal Care
services.description: Complete prenatal care package including regular check-ups, ultrasound scans, and nutritional counseling for expecting mothers.

services.name: Chiropractic Adjustment
services.description: Spinal adjustments and manipulations to relieve pain and improve alignment, performed by a licensed chiropractor.

services.name: Dermatology Consultation
services.description: Consultation with a dermatologist for skin issues such as acne, rashes, or mole assessments.

services.name: Nutrition Counseling
services.description: Personalized nutritional advice and diet planning with a certified nutritionist to improve overall health and manage medical conditions.

services.name: Mental Health Therapy
services.description: Counseling sessions with a licensed therapist to support mental well-being, including cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT).

services.name: Allergy Testing
services.description: Comprehensive testing to identify allergic reactions to various substances such as pollen, food, and animal dander.
